actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the release to the Department of Justice certain materials, documents and other information obtained by and in the possession of the Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs to provide the Department of Justice with specified documents and information obtained during an investigation of T. Bertram Lance.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the release to the Department of Justice certain materials, documents and other information obtained by and in the possession of the Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.
